name: VR HOVERBIKE (for Cardboard VR Headsets)
description:
Choose your hoverbike (each with unique performance characteristics), and gather as many points as possible by riding under the gates while racing against the clock to complete a single lap. 

Use the magnetic cardboard headset button to activate and deactivate the thruster and tilt your head left or right to turn.

This project was created as part of an internal "game jam" to work with our internal project management systems and to complete a cardboard VR game that used only the headset controls.

Thanks to all the contributors, we hope you enjoy!
